trans-unit.source: Enumerates the values of <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisWord" name="EmphasisWord" href=""></xref> for a specific <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값을 열거 <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisWord" name="EmphasisWord" href=""> </xref> 특정 <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The word emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: 단어 강조 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> 인스턴스에 대 한 속성</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> 에서 반환 된 개체</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> 에서 속성</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> 을 통해 인스턴스에</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> 대해 설정 되어

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render emphasis; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: 음성 합성 엔진이 각는 무료 강조; 렌더링 하는 방법을 확인 하려면 강조의 성격 언어, 언어, 성별 또는 음성 간에 다릅니다.

trans-unit.source: Both EmphasisWord and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: 두 EmphasisWord 및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>설정 하거나 가져올 때 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>에 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>인스턴스.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of EmphasisWord are greater than or equal to zero, and the values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> are all less than zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: EmphasisWord의 실제 값은&0; 보다 크거나 사실과의 값으로 두 값을 구별할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>적음에도 모두&0;입니다; 보다 및의 값을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>속성에는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>에서 반환 된 개체는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>는 인스턴스에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>

trans-unit.source: Indicates an engine-specific default level of emphasis.
trans-unit.target: 강조의 엔진 특정 기본 수준을 나타냅니다.
